chunks.en: 60 years old, advice on choosing the second car in life

chunks.en: Sorry for the slightly clickbait title. I've been helping my dad look at cars recently. Since he used to drive a 2011 POLO, he still wants to look at Volkswagen's SUVs for his next car. He himself likes the FAW-Volkswagen Tange, but this car is about to be replaced, so I arranged to look at the SAIC-Volkswagen Tiguan L. The interior and exterior are really old-fashioned, and there is no qualitative leap compared to the POLO.

In the same class, I also selected the Lynk & Co 08, BYD Song L-dmi, and Tang. The interior of BYD is relatively mediocre and doesn't have a good-looking feel. I haven't test driven it yet. I was amazed by the test drive of the Lynk & Co 08, mainly in terms of design, and I think the chassis texture is acceptable.

Of course, the above is my own test drive experience. Specifically, I still want to take him to test drive 4 to 5 cars, considering plug-in hybrids and gasoline cars, but not considering pure electric range extension. See if you guys have any suggestions or complaints.

|Model| Type | Sales| Price| Remarks
| -------- | -------- |-------- |-------- |-------- |
|Tiguan L 330TSI | Gasoline Car| 26663| 17.99| 18.8 on the road
|Lynk & Co 08 E-MP| Plug-in Hybrid| 5693| 17.58| 16.5 on the road
|Audi Q3| Gasoline Car| 3225| 17.98| 25 Year Redesign
|Tang New Energy| Plug-in Hybrid| 15942| 17.98|
|Song l dmi| Plug-in Hybrid||| 13.68|
If it's from the list, I would choose the Lynk & Co 08 E-MP
Suggest you let your dad test drive them one by one, and then choose one he is satisfied with
@dxddd #4 6
08 owner, I don't recommend 08, the OTA is a reverse upgrade, you can go to the Dongchedi 08 car owner forum to see the reviews first

chunks.zh: æˆ‘æ¨ä¸ªä¼šæŒ¨éª‚çš„è½¦å‹ï¼Œ60 å²å¯èƒ½å¯¹å“ç‰Œæœ€çœ‹é‡ã€‚å¥”é©° GLB220 ï¼Œ2.0T ç‰ˆæœ¬ 22 ä¸‡è½åœ°å§
chunks.en: I'll recommend a model that will be scolded, 60-year-olds may value the brand the most. Mercedes-Benz GLB220, the 2.0T version should be 220,000 on the road
If you don't care about the brand, I recommend a Geely Xingyue L
@x86 Me too, I don't want to look at Volkswagen at all after the test drive
Why doesn't the Song l dmi have any sales?
Volkswagen 4S stores may go bankrupt in five years.
@ymz It was added later, I haven't studied it carefully yet, mainly because I saw that Song L has high sales and looks better than Tang
08, suitable for young people. But for your dad, I suggest Audi or ask him

@dxddd Tiguan's sales are far ahead, but to be honest, I think the texture of the plastic leather in the interior is not good, maybe the more expensive pro version will be better. The sound insulation is very poor. I played extremely loud music during the test drive. It's all a routine. After turning off the music, it's like opening a window.
The tractor-like engine sound of the Tiguan L is really dissuading. It doesn't feel like the same car series as the old Tiguan at all. The whole car is like blowing up the old model with an air pump.
I can't afford it, but the layout is really nice
@18k I'm still going to take him for a test drive, he will definitely be able to feel the quality
@dddd1919 Getting used to the smoothness of new energy vehicles, I really can't stand the Tiguan's shifting
@syboml Haha, that's right, real owners will discover a lot of pain points. If you want me to recommend the car I drive, I won't recommend it either

chunks.en: If you are considering 08, it is recommended to buy the 245 or 220 range version. The 120 range version can only run less than 60 kilometers in winter without air conditioning and seat heating
Buy a used car, buying a new car at this time will cost too much
Can 08 really be on the road for 16.5? At this price, it feels like you can only buy 01
